name: CyPolice Raid
text: "CyPolice" monsters you control gain 300 ATK/DEF. When this card is activated: You can add 1 "CyPolice" monster from your Deck to your hand, or, if you control no monsters, Special Summon it. Once per turn, during your Main Phase: You can reveal the top card of your Deck then, if the revealed card is a "CyPolice" monster, Special Summon it. You can only activate 1 "CyPolice Raid" per turn.
